folder.name: Ingest/Cases And Deaths data Ingest Basic Eg 1

properties.description: This is the linked service created for connecting the stcovidreportingdev001 azure storage blob storage account.
This is the linked service created for connecting dlscovidreportingdev001 azure data lake gen 2 storage account.

scriptLines: SelectRequiredFeilds2 split(indicator == 'Weekly new hospital admissions per 100k' || indicator == 'Weekly new ICU admissions per 100k',
pivotBy(indicator, ['Weekly new hospital admissions per 100k', 'Weekly new ICU admissions per 100k']),
